pageHeader.title: API Keys
pageHeader.description: Manage your API keys for system access

ApiKeyPage.title: API Keys
ApiKeyPage.description: Manage your API keys for system access

placeholders.search: Search by name or key prefix...

loadingStates.error: Failed to load API keys. Please try again.

create.title: Create New API Key
create.description: Generate a new API key for system access

name.label: API Key Name
name.description: A descriptive name for this API key

expiresAt.label: Expiration
expiresAt.description: The token will expire on the selected date

customDate.label: Select date *
customDate.description: The token will expire on the selected date

warning.title: ⚠️ Important Security Notice
warning.message: This is the only time you will be able to see this API key. Please copy it now and store it securely. You will not be able to retrieve it again.

success.title: API Key Created Successfully
success.description: Your new API key has been generated. Make sure to copy it now as you won't be able to see it again.
success.copied: API key copied to clipboard successfully

error.description: Failed to create API key. Please try again.
error.copyFailed: Failed to copy API key to clipboard

add.title: Add New API Key
add.description: Create a new API key for system access

name.label: API Key Name
name.description: A descriptive name for this API key

permissions.label: Permissions
permissions.description: Select the permissions for this API key

expiresAt.label: Expiration Date
expiresAt.description: When this API key should expire (optional)

isActive.label: Active
isActive.description: Whether this API key is active

update.title: Update API Key
update.description: Modify the API key settings and status

name.label: API Key Name
name.description: A descriptive name for this API key

isActive.label: Active Status
isActive.description: Enable or disable this API key

delete.title: Delete API Key
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. Please confirm by typing the API key name.

warning.title: ⚠️ Permanent Deletion Warning
warning.message: This action will permanently delete the API key and immediately revoke access for all applications using it. This cannot be undone.

confirmation.label: Type
confirmation.placeholder: Type the API key name here
confirmation.mismatch: API key name does not match

error.nameRequired: Please type the API key name to confirm deletion

notifications.copyError: Failed to copy API key to clipboard
notifications.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
